      • fromIPAddress

        public static SubnetDevices fromIPAddress(java.lang.String ipAddress)

      • setNoThreads

        public SubnetDevices setNoThreads(int noThreads)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        noThreads - set the number of threads to work with, note we default to a large number as these requests are network heavy not cpu heavy.
        Returns:
        - this for chaining
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if invalid number of threads requested

      • setTimeOutMillis

        public SubnetDevices setTimeOutMillis(int timeOutMillis)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the timeout for each address we try to ping
        Parameters:
        timeOutMillis - - timeout in milliseconds for each ping
        Returns:
        this object to allow chaining
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if timeout is less than zero

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel a running scan

      • findDevices

        public SubnetDevices findDevices(SubnetDevices.OnSubnetDeviceFound listener)
        Starts the scan to find other devices on the subnet
        Parameters:
        listener - - to pass on the results
        Returns:
        this object so we can call cancel on it if needed
